articles.content:
Mass Gymnastic Display Held in South Phyongan Province 
    Phyongsong, October 20 (KCNA) -- A mass gymnastic display "The General and South Phyongan Province" was performed in the newly built Phyongsong Stadium Wednesday. 
 It was appreciated by Chief Secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK Ri Thae Nam, Chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial People's Committee Kim Jong Thae, leading officials of the party and power bodies and working people's organizations in the province and Phyongsong city and its working people. The mass gymnastic display having a prelude, three scenes and a final was produced by officials and other working people and school youth and children in the province on the occasion of the 60th birthday of the WPK, prompted by their unanimous desire to convey to posterity the immortal revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il while guiding the work in the province. 
 The work makes an extensive and profound representation of the great leadership, noble virtues and deep loving care of the two leaders who clearly indicated the ways for the province to follow and wisely led it to bring about epoch-making changes.    
 It was acclaimed by the spectators for having impressively depicted the road of development covered by the province under the experienced and tested leadership of the peerlessly great men through such scenes as gymnastics with clubs and torches, children's gymnastics, gymnastics with flags and ever-changing background.

articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Russian President 
    Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of sympathy to V. V. Putin, president of the Russian Federation, in connection with big casualties caused by a reckless attack of armed bandits in Nalchik, capital of the Kabardino-Balkariya Republic.
 The message vehemently denounced the extreme action as a base terrorism to destroy the internal stability of Russia including North Caucasus.
 The message sincerely wished the president, the government and the people of Russia successes in the work to achieve the territorial integrity and social stability of the country.

articles.title: Paek Nam Sun Meets German Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets American VIPs 
    Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with Bill Richardson, governor of New Mexico State of the United States, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
 On hand were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Kye Gwan and others.

articles.title: Delegations Leave for Russia and China
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Meets German Ambassador 
    Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and had a talk with Friedrich Ludwig Loehr, new German ambassador e. p. to the DPRK, on Oct. 20 when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

Delegations Leave for Russia and China
    Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Forestry led by its Vice-Minister Ri Jin Son left here Thursday for Russia to participate in the 8th meeting of the Sub-Committee of Forestry of the Inter-Governmental Committee for Cooperation in Trade, Economy and Science and Technology between the DPRK and Russia. 
  A delegation of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of the Fatherland led by Director of its Secretariat Kim Wan Su left here today to visit China.
